Description: Etisalat UAE offers fixed-line broadband service in the United Arab Emirates. It is a subsidiary of Emirates Telecommunications Corporation, a multinational UAE based telecommunications services provider.

Movistar is a fixed-line broadband service operated in Spain by Telefónica de España, a subsidiary company of Telefónica, a multinational telecommunications company that also operates in many Latin American countries.

Vodafone UK offers fixed-line broadband services in the United Kingdom. It is a subsidiary of the multinational telecommunications company Vodafone Group Plc, which operates worldwide with a significant footprint in Europe, Asia, the Middle East, and Africa.
AT&T’s offers fixed-line broadband service in the United States. Its broadband services include telephony, internet access, and network integration.
Telenor Norway offers fixed-line broadband services in Norway. It is a subsidiary of Telenor ASA, which offers services in Scandinavia and a number of Asian countries.
Deutsche Telekom offers fixed-line broadband services in Germany. It is the largest telecommunications provider in Europe and also offers services in Africa, Asia, and the Americas.

Ooredoo Qatar offers fixed-line broadband services in Qatar. It is a subsidiary of Ooredoo Q.S.C. (formerly Qtel), an international telecommunications company headquartered in Qatar with operations across the Middle East, North Africa, and Asia.
Orange France offers fixed-line broadband service in France. It is a subsidiary of Orange S.A. (formerly France Télécom S.A.), a French multinational telecommunications corporation.
Airtel India offers fixed-line broadband service in India. It is a subsidiary of Bharti Airtel Limited, a global telecommunications company that operates in countries across South Asia and Africa.

MTN South Africa offers fixed-line broadband services in South Africa. It is a subsidiary of MTN Group, a South Africa-based multinational mobile telecommunications company, operating in many African, European, and Asian countries.
